text: A5. Short-term: #PassTheMic to #BlackMenInMedicine & #BlackWomenInMedicine like @gradydoctor who #DoTheWork to understand #COVID19 #vaccine hesitancy. Long-term: earn the trust of #BIPOC by acknowledging & ending #racism so we don’t need short-term fixes. #BLM #AskReuters https://t.co/aJkkaA3SKN
